actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should request the resignation of Secretary of the Interior James Watt.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should request the resignation of James Watt from the Office of the Secretary of the Interior.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should request the resignation of Secretary of the Interior James Watt.
